overview:
CEO and Co-founder at Altura Networks, S.L., the web development firm based in Spain that created Alertia Monitoring application.

Lazaro Vicedo, founded in 1998 the hosting company Gravitynet E-Solutions,S.L., one of the first hosting companies in Spain. The company was acquired by Arsys internet in 2009, and Mr. Vicedo left the company 2 months later.

In 2011 Lazaro Vicedo launches the self-funding startup Altura Networks, S.L. that is focused 100% in providing an accesible and economic monitoring solution for website users, system administrators and cloud providers.
